stage_identity.evidence: Teen Byte clearly visible with gangly proportions, longer limbs, standing upright on two legs. Blueish pixel art blob form maintained with awkward but endearing teen posture. Face shows content expression looking upward toward trophy.

pixel_style.evidence: Clean pixel art style preserved with 2D forms, dithered shading on character and environment. Output is 512x512 PNG at 312KB. Color palette matches expected tones: blue Byte, warm wood tones, golden trophy, green succulent.

requested_changes_visible.evidence: Primary change from sitting at desk to standing on floor and looking at trophy is clearly visible. Byte's pose shifted from seated to standing upright with body turned toward trophy shelf. Expression shows admiration/pride.

artifact_free.evidence: No garbled text, floating glyphs, or malformed anatomy. Character limbs properly formed. No duplicated objects or smeared elements. Clean edges throughout.

prop_layout_integrity.evidence: Exactly one golden 10-day trophy positioned on left side of wooden shelf. Exactly one green succulent plant on right side of shelf with clear spacing between them. One food bowl with kibble on floor to right of desk. All props single-instance with no overlap.

anchors_present.evidence: Byte present in teen form. Wooden desk with oversized laptop in center. Chicago skyline visible through window on left wall. All three required identity anchors confirmed present.

temporal_mood_match.evidence: State shows is_sleeping=false, local_hour=15 (afternoon), mood=content. Image shows bright warm afternoon lighting through window, Byte awake and alert with eyes open, content/proud expression while admiring trophy. All temporal flags match visual representation.

reground_cleanup.evidence: Mode is normal, not re-ground. Check not applicable. Previous re-ground was successful and this normal edit builds upon that clean foundation.
